description.en: NEM was a blockchain platform launched in March of 2015. At the time it was one of the pioneers of the industry and sought to improve on the imperfections found on other chains at the time. It was one of the first non-turing complete chains to feature user-defined tokens (called mosaics), namespaces, multisignature accounts, and a P2P reputation system based on EigenTrust++. Its most notable contribution, however, was the PoI consensus mechanism which sought to reward on-chain activity and deter the concentration of wealth commonly associated with proof-of-stake. Its client, NIS, is written in Java. Today, NEM remains a highly-traded cryptocurrency. Current development is centered around NEM's merge with another blockchain platform: Symbol.

description.th: NEM was a blockchain platform launched in March of 2015. At the time it was one of the pioneers of the industry and sought to improve on the imperfections found on other chains at the time. It was one of the first non-turing complete chains to feature user-defined tokens (called mosaics), namespaces, multisignature accounts, and a P2P reputation system based on EigenTrust++. Its most notable contribution, however, was the PoI consensus mechanism which sought to reward on-chain activity and deter the concentration of wealth commonly associated with proof-of-stake. Its client, NIS, is written in Java. Today, NEM remains a highly-traded cryptocurrency. Current development is centered around NEM's merge with another blockchain platform: Symbol.

status_updates.description:
A perspective on how NIS1 and Symbol (should) interact from our Software CTO - Kristy-Leigh Minehan

Read this thread ğŸ‘‰ https://twitter.com/NEMofficial/status/1372148166179520521?s=20

Here's everything you need to know to get started on #Symbol.

Check it here ğŸ‘‰ https://symbolplatform.com/latest/getting-started-on-symbol

NGL CEO David Shaw explains NGL's role in the #NEM Ecosystem and clarifies the four distinct components that support the NGL and broader ecosystem. 

1. Community
2. Software
3. Ventures
4. Treasury

Read more on the NEM Forum: https://forum.nem.io/t/nem-group-update/25209

We are LIVE!

Nemplatform.com - refreshed website for all information on/about #NIS1.

Nem.io - new website to explain the #NEM ecosystem.

Symbolplatform.com - a new website with all the latest updates, information, resources & support for #Symbol.
